About me

I am a French-Brazilian product manager working with data and analytics. I have lived most of my life in São Paulo and am currently a happy Parisian. I am passionate about all things tech, languages, corgis, and (so) many other things.

Welcome to my page! Check out some of my personal projects on the top right corner. Feel free to drop me a line at angela@chieh.co.

This page was built with Jekyll based on a theme by @TaylanTatli and @skeroble (orginal work). Images come from Unsplash, Lorem Pixel, or myself.
